about_the_game:
Listen to newly arranged tracks from the original Persona 3 plus all new tracks from Persona 3 Reload, presented by the Atlus sound team for a total of 60 new songs.

*Please note that tracks can only be played on the app and cannot be downloaded in any audio format, such as MP3.
